GK19amaru_u:2: This edition is based on the one in Kāvya-saṅgraha edited by Jīvānanda
GK19amaru_u:3: Vidyāsāgara. It has been compared with the Motilal Banarsidass edition (1983)
GK19amaru_u:4: containing the commentary of Arjunavarmadeva. The number in parentheses at the
GK19amaru_u:5: end of the last line of each verse is the number of the verse in the Motilal
GK19amaru_u:6: edition. There seems to be a great deal of variation in the order and numbering
GK19amaru_u:7: of the verses between the editions and the commentators. The order of the verses
GK19amaru_u:8: found in the Kāvya-saṅgraha forms the backbone of the order of the verses
GK19amaru_u:9: presented here, even though Arjunavarmadeva considers some of the verses found
GK19amaru_u:10: in that edition to be interpolations. Those suspect verses have been noted in
GK19amaru_u:12: The parentheses in between verses contain citations for the major
GK19amaru_u:13: anthologies. These have been taken from Sures Chandra Banerji's
GK19amaru_u:14: edition of Śrīdharadāsa's Sadukti-karṇāmṛta. The abbreviations for those
GK19amaru_u:22: (These equivalences have been taken from the Banerji edition of Sad-ukti-karṇāmṛta and the De edition of Padyāvalī.)
GK19amaru_u:32: kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ ||2|| (2)
GK19amaru_u:42: kathaya sukṛtī ko'yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate ||4|| (4)
GK19amaru_u:44: datto'syāḥ praṇayastvayaiva bhavatā ceyaṃ ciraṃ lālitā
GK19amaru_u:45: daivād adya kila tvameva kṛtavān asyā navaṃ vipriyam |
GK19amaru_u:46: manyurduḥsaha eṣa yātyupaśamaṃ no sāntvavādaiḥ sphuṭaṃ
GK19amaru_u:53: nāryastanvi haṭhāddharanti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās
GK19amaru_u:54: tatkiṃ tāmyasi kiṃ ca rodiṣi mudhā tāsāṃ priyaṃ mā kṛthāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:58: nāryo mugdhaśaṭhā haranti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās
GK19amaru_u:61: nītvā keliniketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:63: dhanyo hanyata eva nihnutiparaḥ preyān rudatyā hasan ||8|| (9)
GK19amaru_u:70: yātāḥ kiṃ na milanti sundari punaścintā tvayā matkṛte
GK19amaru_u:71: no kāryā nitarāṃ kṛśāmi kathayatyevaṃ sabāṣpe mayi |
GK19amaru_u:74: dhīraṃ vāridharasya vāri kirataḥ śrutvā niśīthe dhvaniṃ
GK19amaru_u:80: kaṭhinahṛdayastyaktvā śayyāṃ balād gata eva saḥ |
GK19amaru_u:82: punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ prayāti karomi kim ||12||(15)
GK19amaru_u:88: ajñānena parāṅmukhīṃ paribhavād āśliṣya māṃ duḥkhitāṃ
GK19amaru_u:89: kiṃ labdhaṃ caṭula tvayeha nayatā saubhāgyametāṃ daśām |
GK19amaru_u:109: mugdhākṣī svaiptīti tatparijanaṃ svairaṃ priye pṛcchati |
GK19amaru_u:118: paśyāmo mayi kiṃ prapadyata iti sthairyaṃ mayālambitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:121: savyājaṃ hasitaṃ mayā dhṛtiharo bāṣpastu muktastayā ||20||(24)
GK19amaru_u:130: ityukte kva tad ityudīrya sahasā tatsampramārṣṭuṃ mayā
GK19amaru_u:132: tvaṃ mugdhākṣi vinaiva kañculikayā dhatse manohāriṇīṃ
GK19amaru_u:139: dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane ||24||(28)
GK19amaru_u:141: kānte katyapi vāsarāṇi gamaya tvaṃ mīlayitvā dṛśau
GK19amaru_u:142: svasti svasti nimīlayāmi nayane yāvan na śūnyā diśaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:152: tanurapi na te doṣo'smākaṃ vidhistu parāṅmukhaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:153: tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannamimāṃ daśāṃ
GK19amaru_u:154: prakṛticapale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite ||27|| (30)
GK19amaru_u:156: urasi nihitastāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane
GK19amaru_u:162: kiṃ mugdhe na mayā kṛtaṃ ramaṇadhīrmuktā tvayā gamyatāṃ
GK19amaru_u:163: dusthaṃ tiṣṭhasi yacca pathyamadhunā kartāsmi tacchroṣyasi ||29||(33)
GK19amaru_u:164: sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ
GK19amaru_u:166: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ
GK19amaru_u:170: dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:171: gantuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā
GK19amaru_u:177: prāptaṃ tairamṛtaṃ mudhaiva mathito mūḍhaiḥ suraiḥ sāgaraḥ ||32||(36)
GK19amaru_u:180: premāvāsitayā mayā saralayā nyastaṃ mukhaṃ tanmukhe |
GK19amaru_u:182: lajjāsīn mama tena sāpyapahṛtā tatkālayogyaiḥ kramaiḥ ||33||(37)
GK19amaru_u:183: kopo yatra bhrūkuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ
GK19amaru_u:185: tasya premṇastad idamadhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ
GK19amaru_u:186: tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ ||34||(38)
GK19amaru_u:188: sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ
GK19amaru_u:189: na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃ vidho'bhūt |
GK19amaru_u:195: mā mā mānada māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī
GK19amaru_u:196: suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim ||36||(40)
GK19amaru_u:203: nivṛtte sadbhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:205: na jāne ko heturdalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam ||38||(43)
GK19amaru_u:206: (uccāvacaṃ, su. 697, sad. 1368, subh. 1141, śā. 3545, sū. 84.1, rasārṇavasudhākara 2.263c)
GK19amaru_u:210: prasarati kathā bahvī yūnoryathā na tathā ratiḥ ||39||(44)
GK19amaru_u:212: puṣpāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitena racito no kundajātyādibhiḥ |
GK19amaru_u:213: dattaḥ svedamucā payodharayuge nārghyo na kumbhāmbhasā
GK19amaru_u:224: tāvantyeva kṛtāgaso drutataraṃ vyāhṛtya patyuḥ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:225: prārabdhā purato yathā manasijasyājñā tathā vartituṃ
GK19amaru_u:226: premṇo maugdhyavibhūṣaṇasya sahajaḥ ko'pyeṣa kāntaḥ kramaḥ ||43||(48)
GK19amaru_u:237: sphuṭo rekhānyāsaḥ kathamapi sa tādṛk pariṇato
GK19amaru_u:238: gatā yena vyaktaṃ punaravayavaiḥ saiva taruṇī ||46||(51)*asya ślokasya parārdhaḥ:
GK19amaru_u:242: ruṣā brahmāstraṃ me śarasi nihito vāmacaraṇaḥ ||
GK19amaru_u:246: kimidamathavā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayā hi viniścitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:247: yad abhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām ||47||(53)
GK19amaru_u:257: nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ ||49||*rudramadevakumārasya ṭīkāyāmapyeṣa śloko dṛśyate|
GK19amaru_u:262: tadanukṛtavatī sā yatra vāco nivṛttāḥ ||50||*vemabhūpālasya ṭīkāyāmapyeṣa śloko dṛśyate|
GK19amaru_u:266: priyatamā mama jīvitahāriṇī ||51||*prakṣipto'yaṃ śloka iti arjunavarmadevamahāśayāḥ|
GK19amaru_u:270: so'ṅgīkṛto bhagavatā makaradhvajena ||52||*vemabhūpālasya ṭīkāyāmeṣa ślokaḥ kevalaṃ labhyate|
GK19amaru_u:272: bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
GK19amaru_u:273: khedo'smāsu na me'parādhyati bhavān sarve'parādhā mayi |
GK19amaru_u:274: tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate
GK19amaru_u:275: nanvetan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate ||53||(57)
GK19amaru_u:280: pītvā śītkārivaktraṃ śiśuharidṛśāṃ haimanā vānti vātāḥ ||
GK19amaru_u:283: śrutvā tanvyā niśīthe navaghanarasitaṃ viślathāṅkaṃ patitvā
GK19amaru_u:286: smṛtvā smṛtvā priyasya skhalitamṛduvaco rudyate pānthabadhvā ||
GK19amaru_u:289: śliṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kimiti na mayā mūḍhayā prāṇanāthaś
GK19amaru_u:290: cumbatyasmin vadanavidhutiḥ kiṃ kṛtā kiṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:292: paścāttāpaṃ vahati taruṇī premṇi jāte rasajñā ||56||(58)
GK19amaru_u:294: śrutvā nāmāpi yasya sphuṭaghanapulakaṃ jāyate'ṅgaṃ samantāt
GK19amaru_u:297: bhagnā mānasya cintā bhavati mama pnarvajramayyāḥ kadā nu ||57||(59)
GK19amaru_u:314: priyajanena na yatra samāgamaḥ ||60||*rudramadevakumārasya ṭīkāyāmeṣa ślokaḥ kevalaṃ labhyate|
GK19amaru_u:317: puṇyāhaṃ vraja maṅgalaṃ sudivasaṃ prātaḥ prayātasya te
GK19amaru_u:321: no vā pādatale tayā nipatitaṃ tiṣṭheti noktaṃ vacaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:325: na jāne saṃmukhāyāte priyāṇi vadati priye |
GK19amaru_u:326: sarvāṇyaṅgāni me yānti śrotratāṃ kimu netratām ||63||(64)
GK19amaru_u:333: pādāsakte suciramiha te vāmatā kaiva kānte
GK19amaru_u:336: bāṣpodbhedaistad anu sahasā na sthitaṃ na prayātam ||65||(68)
GK19amaru_u:338: tato nu tvaṃ preyānvayamapi hatāśāḥ priyatamāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:342: mānaṃ dhatsva dhṛtiṃ vadhāna ṛjutāṃ dūre kuru preyasi |
GK19amaru_u:344: nīceḥ śaṃsa hṛdi sthito nanu sa me prāṇeśvaraḥ śroṣyati ||67||(70)
GK19amaru_u:348: tāvaṇyamasti bahu tatra kimapi citram ||68|| *prakṣipto'yaṃ śloka iti arjunavarmadevamahāśayāḥ|
GK19amaru_u:350: prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me |
GK19amaru_u:351: ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle
GK19amaru_u:356: mugdhā kudmalitānanena dadhato vāyuṃ sthitā tasya sā
GK19amaru_u:357: bhrāntyā dhūrtatayā ca vepathumatī tenāniśaṃ cumbitā ||70||(72)
GK19amaru_u:358: sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ
GK19amaru_u:359: na sakhi caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punardayitena me |
GK19amaru_u:364: śayyā samprati komalāṅgi paruṣetyāropya māṃ vakṣasi |
GK19amaru_u:373: dattaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyāsminkṣaṇe
GK19amaru_u:378: tanvaṅgyā ratikātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam ||75||(77)
GK19amaru_u:385: tacchūnye punarāsthitāsmi bhavane prāṇāsta ete dṛḍhāḥ
GK19amaru_u:390: lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā ||78||(82)
GK19amaru_u:395: jātā notkalikā stanau na lulitau gātraṃ na romāñcitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:397: dṛṣṭenāva mano hṛtaṃ dhṛtimuṣā prāṇeśvareṇādya me
GK19amaru_u:401: ityākṣipya yadā samastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:405: na dṛṣṭeḥ śaithilyaṃ milana iti ceto dahati me
GK19amaru_u:413: ghana ghaṭayituṃ nisnehaṃ tvāṃ ya eva nivartane
GK19amaru_u:414: prabhavati gavāṃ kinnaśchinnaṃ sa eva dhanañjayaḥ ||84||(32)
GK19amaru_u:416: gacchantī kva nu gacchasīti vidhṛtā bālā paṭānte mayā |
GK19amaru_u:417: pratyāvṛttamukhī sabāṣpanayanā māṃ muñca muñceti sā
GK19amaru_u:422: saubhāgyacihnamiva mūrdhni padaṃ vireje ||86|| *prakṣipto'yaṃ śloka iti arjunavarmadevamahāśayāḥ|
GK19amaru_u:426: priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam ||87|| (81)
GK19amaru_u:432: (anyaraticihnaduḥkhitā; sad. 594; śā. 3740, subh. 2215; sū. 82.17; pad. 222; daśarūpaka 2.6)
GK19amaru_u:441: tanvaṅgyā gurusannidhau nayanajaṃ yad vāri saṃstambhitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:447: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:453: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:454: baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā ||
GK19amaru_u:457: yatnenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi |
GK19amaru_u:461: mlānaṃ pāṇḍu kṛśaṃ viyogavidhuraṃ lambālakaṃ sālasaṃ
GK19amaru_u:464: yatpītaṃ sutanormayā vadanakaṃ vaktuṃ na tatpāryate ||94||(88)
GK19amaru_u:465: saivāhaṃ pramadā nṛṇāmadhigatāvetau ca tau nūpurāv
GK19amaru_u:467: itthaṃ lajjitayā smṛterupagame matvā tanuṃ sambhramāt
GK19amaru_u:473: santyevātra gṛhe gṛhe yuvatayastāḥ pṛccha gatvādhunā
GK19amaru_u:474: preyāṃsaḥ praṇamanti kiṃ tava punardāso yathā vartate |
GK19amaru_u:475: ātmadrohiṇi durjanaiḥ pralapitaṃ karṇe'niśaṃ mā kṛthāś
GK19amaru_u:478: nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate |
GK19amaru_u:480: sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇamākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ ||98|| (92)
GK19amaru_u:482: adyārabhya yadi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā'nyasya vā
GK19amaru_u:485: eko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyānmama prāvṛṣi ||99||(93)
GK19amaru_u:486: idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama tanu śvetamatha kiṃ
GK19amaru_u:489: sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ ||100||(94)
GK19amaru_u:492: iti hi capalo mānārambhastathāpi hi notsahe
GK19amaru_u:497: gṛhītā dharmille sakhi sa ca mayā gāḍhamadhare ||102||(98)
GK19amaru_u:499: rāge yāte'tibhūmiṃ vikasati sutarāṃ gocare dūtikāyāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:502: kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād
GK19amaru_u:505: ko'yaṃ kāsmi rataṃ nu vā kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ ||104||(101)
GK19amaru_u:506: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhataḥ sā puraḥ sā
GK19amaru_u:507: paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tadviyogāturasya |
GK19amaru_u:508: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiraparā nāsti me kāpi sā sā
GK19amaru_u:509: sā sā sā sā jagati sakale ko'yamadvaitavādaḥ ||105||(102)
GK19amaru_u:511: tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:515: Verses found in Arjunavarmadeva's version not found here
GK19amaru_u:517: tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi |
GK19amaru_u:520: tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayos
GK19amaru_u:522: pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ
GK19amaru_u:523: sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ ||(11)
GK19amaru_u:525: yo dīrghaṃ divasaṃ viṣahya viṣamaṃ yatnātkathaṃciddhṛtaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:531: mānasyāpi jalāñjaliḥ sarabhasaṃ lokena datto yathā ||(54)
GK19amaru_u:537: tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ suracitāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā |
GK19amaru_u:539: mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ ||(63)
GK19amaru_u:541: svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari ||(65)
GK19amaru_u:543: na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yadvadhūḥ kiyanna tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam ||(66)
GK19amaru_u:550: This edition is based on the one in Kāvya-saṅgraha edited
GK19amaru_u:551: by Jīvānanda Vidyāsāgara. īt has been compared with the
GK19amaru_u:552: Motilal Banarsidass edition (1983) containing the commentary of
GK19amaru_u:553: Arjunavarmadeva. The number in parentheses at the end of the last
GK19amaru_u:554: line of each verse is the number of the verse in the Motilal edition.
GK19amaru_u:555: There seems to be a great deal of variation in the order and numbering
GK19amaru_u:556: of the verses between the editions and the commentators. The order of
GK19amaru_u:557: the verses found in the Kāvya-saṅgraha forms the backbone
GK19amaru_u:558: of the order of the verses presented here, even though Arjunavarmadeva
GK19amaru_u:559: considers some of the verses found in that edition to be
GK19amaru_u:560: interpolations. Those suspect verses have been noted in the footnotes.
GK19amaru_u:561: The parentheses in between verses contain citations for the major
GK19amaru_u:562: anthologies. These have been taken from Sures Chandra Banerji's
GK19amaru_u:563: edition of Srīdharadāsa's Sadukti-karṇāmṛta. The abbreviations for those
GK19amaru_u:571: (These equivalences have been taken from the Banerji edition of Sadukti-karṇāmṛta and the De edition of Padyāvalī}.)

GK19amaru_u:591: kathaya sukṛtī ko'yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate ||4||(4)
GK19amaru_u:593: datto'syāḥ praṇayastvayaiva bhavatā ceyaṃ ciraṃ lālitā
GK19amaru_u:594: daivād adya kila tvameva kṛtavān asyā navaṃ vipriyam |
GK19amaru_u:595: manyurduḥsaha eṣa yātyupaśamaṃ no sāntvavādaiḥ sphuṭaṃ

GK19amaru_u:603: tatkiṃ tāmyasi kiṃ ca rodiṣi mudhā tāsāṃ priyaṃ mā kṛthāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:607: nāryo mugdhaśaṭhā haranti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās

GK19amaru_u:628: kaṭhinahṛdayastyaktvā śayyāṃ balād gata eva saḥ |
GK19amaru_u:630: punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ prayāti karomi kim ||12||(15)
GK19amaru_u:636: ajñānena parāṅmukhīṃ paribhavād āśliṣya māṃ duḥkhitāṃ
GK19amaru_u:637: kiṃ labdhaṃ caṭula tvayeha nayatā saubhāgyametāṃ daśām |
GK19amaru_u:657: mugdhākṣī svaiptīti tatparijanaṃ svairaṃ priye pṛcchati |
GK19amaru_u:666: paśyāmo mayi kiṃ prapadyata iti sthairyaṃ mayālambitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:669: savyājaṃ hasitaṃ mayā dhṛtiharo bāṣpastu muktastayā ||20||(24)
GK19amaru_u:678: ityukte kva tad ityudīrya sahasā tatsampramārṣṭuṃ mayā
GK19amaru_u:680: tvaṃ mugdhākṣi vinaiva kañculikayā dhatse manohāriṇīṃ
GK19amaru_u:687: dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane ||24||(28)
GK19amaru_u:689: kānte katyapi vāsarāṇi gamaya tvaṃ mīlayitvā dṛśau
GK19amaru_u:690: svasti svasti nimīlayāmi nayane yāvan na śūnyā diśaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:700: tanurapi na te doṣo'smākaṃ vidhistu parāṅmukhaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:701: tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannamimāṃ daśāṃ
GK19amaru_u:702: prakṛticapale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite ||27||(30)
GK19amaru_u:704: urasi nihitastāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane
GK19amaru_u:710: kiṃ mugdhe na mayā kṛtaṃ ramaṇadhīrmuktā tvayā gamyatāṃ
GK19amaru_u:711: dusthaṃ tiṣṭhasi yacca pathyamadhunā kartāsmi tacchroṣyasi ||29||(33)
GK19amaru_u:712: sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ
GK19amaru_u:714: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ
GK19amaru_u:718: dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:719: gantuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā
GK19amaru_u:725: prāptaṃ tairamṛtaṃ mudhaiva mathito mūḍhaiḥ suraiḥ sāgaraḥ ||32||(36)
GK19amaru_u:728: premāvāsitayā mayā saralayā nyastaṃ mukhaṃ tanmukhe |
GK19amaru_u:730: lajjāsīn mama tena sāpyapahṛtā tatkālayogyaiḥ kramaiḥ ||33||(37)
GK19amaru_u:731: kopo yatra bhrūkuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ
GK19amaru_u:733: tasya premṇastad idamadhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ
GK19amaru_u:734: tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ ||34||(38)
GK19amaru_u:736: sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ
GK19amaru_u:737: na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃ vidho'bhūt |
GK19amaru_u:743: mā mā mānada māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī
GK19amaru_u:744: suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim ||36||(40)
GK19amaru_u:751: nivṛtte sadbhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:753: na jāne ko heturdalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam ||38||(43)
GK19amaru_u:754: (uccāvacaṃ, su. 697, sad. 1368, subh. 1141, śā. 3545, sū. 84.1, rasārṇavasudhākara 2.263c)
GK19amaru_u:758: prasarati kathā bahvī yūnoryathā na tathā ratiḥ ||39||(44)
GK19amaru_u:760: puṣpāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitena racito no kundajātyādibhiḥ |
GK19amaru_u:761: dattaḥ svedamucā payodharayuge nārghyo na kumbhāmbhasā
GK19amaru_u:773: tāvantyeva kṛtāgaso drutataraṃ vyāhṛtya patyuḥ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:774: prārabdhā purato yathā manasijasyājñā tathā vartituṃ
GK19amaru_u:775: premṇo maugdhyavibhūṣaṇasya sahajaḥ ko'pyeṣa kāntaḥ kramaḥ ||43||(48)
GK19amaru_u:786: sphuṭo rekhānyāsaḥ kathamapi sa tādṛk pariṇato
GK19amaru_u:787: gatā yena vyaktaṃ punaravayavaiḥ saiva taruṇī ||46||(51)
GK19amaru_u:792: ruṣā brahmāstraṃ me śarasi nihito vāmacaraṇaḥ ||
GK19amaru_u:796: kimidamathavā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayā hi viniścitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:797: yad abhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām ||47||(53)
GK19amaru_u:806: nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ ||49||
GK19amaru_u:825: bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
GK19amaru_u:826: khedo'smāsu na me'parādhyati bhavān sarve'parādhā mayi |
GK19amaru_u:827: tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate
GK19amaru_u:828: nanvetan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate ||53||(57)
GK19amaru_u:833: pītvā śītkārivaktraṃ śiśuharidṛśāṃ haimanā vānti vātāḥ||54||
GK19amaru_u:835: śrutvā tanvyā niśīthe navaghanarasitaṃ viślathāṅkaṃ patitvā
GK19amaru_u:838: smṛtvā smṛtvā priyasya skhalitamṛduvaco rudyate pānthabadhvā ||55||
GK19amaru_u:840: śliṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kimiti na mayā mūḍhayā prāṇanāthaś
GK19amaru_u:841: cumbatyasmin vadanavidhutiḥ kiṃ kṛtā kiṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:843: paścāttāpaṃ vahati taruṇī premṇi jāte rasajñā ||56||(58)
GK19amaru_u:845: śrutvā nāmāpi yasya sphuṭaghanapulakaṃ jāyate'ṅgaṃ samantāt
GK19amaru_u:848: bhagnā mānasya cintā bhavati mama pnarvajramayyāḥ kadā nu ||57||(59)
GK19amaru_u:867: puṇyāhaṃ vraja maṅgalaṃ sudivasaṃ prātaḥ prayātasya te
GK19amaru_u:871: no vā pādatale tayā nipatitaṃ tiṣṭheti noktaṃ vacaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:875: na jāne saṃmukhāyāte priyāṇi vadati priye |
GK19amaru_u:876: sarvāṇyaṅgāni me yānti śrotratāṃ kimu netratām ||63||(64)
GK19amaru_u:883: pādāsakte suciramiha te vāmatā kaiva kānte
GK19amaru_u:886: bāṣpodbhedaistad anu sahasā na sthitaṃ na prayātam ||65||(68)
GK19amaru_u:888: tato nu tvaṃ preyānvayamapi hatāśāḥ priyatamāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:892: mānaṃ dhatsva dhṛtiṃ vadhāna ṛjutāṃ dūre kuru preyasi |
GK19amaru_u:894: nīceḥ śaṃsa hṛdi sthito nanu sa me prāṇeśvaraḥ śroṣyati ||67||(70)
GK19amaru_u:901: prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me |
GK19amaru_u:902: ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle
GK19amaru_u:907: mugdhā kudmalitānanena dadhato vāyuṃ sthitā tasya sā
GK19amaru_u:908: bhrāntyā dhūrtatayā ca vepathumatī tenāniśaṃ cumbitā ||70||(72)
GK19amaru_u:909: sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ
GK19amaru_u:910: na sakhi caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punardayitena me |
GK19amaru_u:915: śayyā samprati komalāṅgi paruṣetyāropya māṃ vakṣasi |
GK19amaru_u:924: dattaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyāsminkṣaṇe
GK19amaru_u:929: tanvaṅgyā ratikātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam ||75||(77)
GK19amaru_u:936: tacchūnye punarāsthitāsmi bhavane prāṇāsta ete dṛḍhāḥ
GK19amaru_u:941: lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā ||78||(82)
GK19amaru_u:946: jātā notkalikā stanau na lulitau gātraṃ na romāñcitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:948: dṛṣṭenāva mano hṛtaṃ dhṛtimuṣā prāṇeśvareṇādya me
GK19amaru_u:952: ityākṣipya yadā samastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:957: na dṛṣṭeḥ śaithilyaṃ milana iti ceto dahati me
GK19amaru_u:965: ghana ghaṭayituṃ nisnehaṃ tvāṃ ya eva nivartane
GK19amaru_u:966: prabhavati gavāṃ kinnaśchinnaṃ sa eva dhanañjayaḥ ||84||(32)
GK19amaru_u:968: gacchantī kva nu gacchasīti vidhṛtā bālā paṭānte mayā |
GK19amaru_u:969: pratyāvṛttamukhī sabāṣpanayanā māṃ muñca muñceti sā
GK19amaru_u:979: priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam ||87||(81)
GK19amaru_u:985: (anyaraticihnaduḥkhitā; sad. 594; śā. 3740, subh. 2215; sū. 82.17; pad. 222; daśarūpaka 2.6)
GK19amaru_u:994: tanvaṅgyā gurusannidhau nayanajaṃ yad vāri saṃstambhitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:1000: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:1005: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:1006: baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā ||
GK19amaru_u:1009: yatnenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi |
GK19amaru_u:1013: mlānaṃ pāṇḍu kṛśaṃ viyogavidhuraṃ lambālakaṃ sālasaṃ
GK19amaru_u:1016: yatpītaṃ sutanormayā vadanakaṃ vaktuṃ na tatpāryate ||94||(88)
GK19amaru_u:1017: saivāhaṃ pramadā nṛṇāmadhigatāvetau ca tau nūpurāv
GK19amaru_u:1019: itthaṃ lajjitayā smṛterupagame matvā tanuṃ sambhramāt
GK19amaru_u:1025: santyevātra gṛhe gṛhe yuvatayastāḥ pṛccha gatvādhunā
GK19amaru_u:1026: preyāṃsaḥ praṇamanti kiṃ tava punardāso yathā vartate |
GK19amaru_u:1027: ātmadrohiṇi durjanaiḥ pralapitaṃ karṇe'niśaṃ mā kṛthāś
GK19amaru_u:1030: nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate |
GK19amaru_u:1032: sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇamākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ ||98||(92)
GK19amaru_u:1034: adyārabhya yadi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā'nyasya vā
GK19amaru_u:1037: eko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyānmama prāvṛṣi ||99||(93)
GK19amaru_u:1038: idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama tanu śvetamatha kiṃ
GK19amaru_u:1041: sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ ||100||(94)
GK19amaru_u:1044: iti hi capalo mānārambhastathāpi hi notsahe
GK19amaru_u:1049: gṛhītā dharmille sakhi sa ca mayā gāḍhamadhare ||102||(98)
GK19amaru_u:1051: rāge yāte'tibhūmiṃ vikasati sutarāṃ gocare dūtikāyāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:1054: kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād
GK19amaru_u:1057: ko'yaṃ kāsmi rataṃ nu vā kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ ||104||(101)
GK19amaru_u:1058: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhataḥ sā puraḥ sā
GK19amaru_u:1059: paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tadviyogāturasya |
GK19amaru_u:1060: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiraparā nāsti me kāpi sā sā
GK19amaru_u:1061: sā sā sā sā jagati sakale ko'yamadvaitavādaḥ ||105||(102)
GK19amaru_u:1063: Verses found in Arjunavarmadeva's version not found here
GK19amaru_u:1065: tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi |
GK19amaru_u:1068: tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayos
GK19amaru_u:1070: pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ
GK19amaru_u:1071: sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ ||(11)
GK19amaru_u:1073: yo dīrghaṃ divasaṃ viṣahya viṣamaṃ yatnātkathaṃciddhṛtaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:1079: mānasyāpi jalāñjaliḥ sarabhasaṃ lokena datto yathā ||(54)
GK19amaru_u:1085: tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ suracitāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā |
GK19amaru_u:1087: mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ ||(63)
GK19amaru_u:1089: svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari ||(65)
GK19amaru_u:1091: na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yadvadhūḥ kiyanna tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam ||(66)
GK19amaru_u:1093: tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ |
